Shamim Malende (amụrụ n'afọ 1980), bụ onye ọka iwu Ugandan, onye kọmishọna maka ịṅụ iyi, onye na-ahụ maka ọha na eze, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye na-eme ihe gbasara obodo
Ọ bụ onye otu People Power, Our Power Movement na nke National Unity Platform (NUP)

Ọ bụ naanị nwanyị nọ n'òtù iwu nke Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu. Na ntuli aka nke afọ 2021 a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu dị ka onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị maka mpaghara Kampala maka oge 2021-2026.
A mụrụ Malende na Kawempe, Kampala, isi obodo Uganda, na Disemba 1980, nwa Alhajj Jamal Ahmed Sebuta Malende, onye ọka iwu, na Jane Francis Nasunna, onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ.
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị nke Busaale Church of Uganda na Kayunga District
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ O-Level ya na Buziga Islamic Theological Institute na Bbunga, agbata obi dị na Makindye Division, Kampala
Ọ gara Aisha Girls High School na obodo Mbarara, na mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ nke Uganda
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ dị ka nwa akwụkwọ kachasị mma na Western Region na n'etiti ndị kacha elu iri na mba ahụ mgbe ọ nwetasịrị AAAA na ule A-Level ya n'afọ 2000.
A nabatara ya na Mahadum Makerere, mahadum ọha na eze kachasị ochie na nke kachasị ukwuu na Uganda, na nkwado gọọmentị
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere Bachelor of Laws n'afọ 2005
Ọ gara n'ihu nweta diplọma postgraduate na Legal Practice, site na Law Development Centre na Kampala
A nabatara ya na Uganda Bar n'afọ 2008.
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum, ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ụlọ ọrụ nna ya tupu ọ mepee ụlọ ọrụ iwu nke ya, Malende & Company Advocates.
N'ime oge 2018-2020, ọ na-edozi ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ikpe 200 nke ụmụ amaala Uganda a tụrụ mkpọrọ maka mmebi iwu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dị iche iche
Ọtụtụ n'ime ndị ahịa ya bụ ndị bi n'obodo ukwu, ndị na-eto eto, ndị ogbenye, ma na-edebanye aha na People Power, Our Power Movement na National Unity Platform
A kpọrọ ya ka ọ sonye na People Power Legal Team, nke Asuman Basalirwa na Benjamin Katana na-edu.

N'afọ 2020, o kwupụtara ebumnuche ya ịzọ ọkwa onye nnọchi anya nwanyị maka Kampala City na ntuli aka ndị omeiwu Uganda nke 2021. Nke a mere ka ọ megide Stella Nyanzi, onye na-agba ọsọ maka otu ọnọdụ ahụ, na tiketi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Forum for Democratic Change
